      • addWeapon

        public boolean addWeapon​(Weapon weapon,
                         int row,
                         int col)
        Parameters:
        weapon -
        row -
        col -
        Returns:
        true if the Weapon was added, false if the Weapon could not be added. There are several reasons for failure: There are no spots available. The Weapon instance is already in the cell. OR the cell was off the board.

      • removeWeapon

        public Weapon removeWeapon​(Weapon weapon,
                           int row,
                           int col)
        Parameters:
        weapon -
        row -
        col -
        Returns:
        the Weapon removed from the Cell. Returns null of the cell was off the grid
